comments.creator: lassey@chromium.org
comments.author: lassey@chromium.org
comments.text:
When I visit this website: [http://www.businessinsider.com/most-creative-countries-in-the-world-2011-10] the tab becomes completely unresponsive. I can't drag the scroll thumb or click on links on the page. I *can* however use the mouse wheel to scroll the page.

this is a 64bit linux nightly build based off of http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/rev/a896a9e237a0, running on ubuntu 11.04.

Sorry for filing in Firefox->General, I really haven't got a clue where this bug belongs.

this is a 64bit linux nightly build based off of http://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/rev/a896a9e237a0, running on ubuntu 11.04.

Sorry for filing in Firefox->General, I really haven't got a clue where this bug belongs.
